incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - SSL Certificate Provisioning

incident_updates.body: We have identified a constraint in the Certificate Authority issuance pipeline that consequently is hindering our ability to validate a fair amount of certificates. We are awaiting further developments from Google Trust Services.

incidents.name: Single File Purge Delays on China Network

incident_updates.body: This incident is now resolved.

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - CDN Cache Purge

incident_updates.body: We have identified the issue and applied a fix. We are currently monitoring the results.

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - CDN Cache Purge

incident_updates.body: Cloudflare single-file cache purging (purge by URL) called via the Dashboard/API is running up to 60 minutes behind only on the China Network. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Until then you may use a different purge feature but do be aware it may cause additional traffic to your origin server(s). More updates to follow.

incidents.name: Consumer WARP Connectivity Issues

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

We are currently investigating an issue where some users of our 1.1.1.1 with WARP Consumer product may see performance issues browsing the web with DNS over WARP mode enabled.

As a temporary workaround until this issue is resolved please move to DNS over HTTP mode by navigating to Settings -> Advanced -> Connection Options -> DNS settings -> Protocol options and selecting "DNS over HTTPS".
